Package com.irurueta.navigation.indoor.position

Class ReadingSorter<P extends com.irurueta.geometry.Point<?>,R extends Reading<? extends RadioSource>>

java.lang.Object
com.irurueta.navigation.indoor.position.ReadingSorter<P,R>
Type Parameters:
P - a Point type.
R - a Reading type.
public class ReadingSorter<P extends com.irurueta.geometry.Point<?>,R extends Reading<? extends RadioSource>> extends Object
Evenly sorts readings of a fingerprint among different radio sources taking into account their respective quality scores as well.

  • Constructor Details

    • ReadingSorter

      ReadingSorter(List<? extends RadioSourceLocated<P>> sources, Fingerprint<? extends RadioSource,? extends R> fingerprint, double[] sourceQualityScores, double[] fingerprintReadingsQualityScores)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      sources - sources to take into account within readings.
      fingerprint - fingerprint containing readings of different sources.
      sourceQualityScores - quality scores associated to each radio source.
      fingerprintReadingsQualityScores - quality scores associated to each reading within the fingerprint.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if number of source quality scores is not equal to the number of sources, or if number of fingerprint reading quality scores is not equal to the number of readings within fingerprint.
